reviews.author: Oliver
reviews.headline: I love this product!
reviews.body: This sofa has completely changed my life. The delivery process couldn't have been easier. I want to sing about Oliver Space from the rooftops!

reviews.author: new
reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.body: Would rent this dining room table one hundred times over.

reviews.author: Cree
reviews.headline: It could be better
reviews.body: This plain bed feels more like a chair. It's uncomfortable to sleep on it.

reviews.author: Mochi
reviews.headline: So fancy
reviews.body: The name really says what this chair is about

reviews.author: Cat
reviews.headline: what?
reviews.body: This is not even a bed!

reviews.author: Joan
reviews.headline: Nice Rug
reviews.body: This is very soft and you can sit on it
